Text: Psyched about the army of land crawling sharks wielding chainsaws on their heads reputedly appearing in this issue. Thanks a bunch, GH90!

Thanks Hawk~

Ok ok , this one was pretty good. But then again, no Ezekiel in this issue. Lets see if Mr. Puss Puss obeys his commands in issue #110
i thought you'd like the letters column bit about his tiger...

STF - Yup , Think about it, if you wrote a comic book you too would lurk the pirate bay to read the comments and see how many leechers there was.

I'm betting Kirkman was talking directly to me.

Just a hunch

http://cdn.bleedingcool.net/wp-content/uploads//2013/04/i22.jpg?802b89

god i hope that link works.

"ezekiel has a tiger" - the t-shirt

and yeah, kirkman certainly loves bitching about piracy. hell GunningHawk90 could be tony moore.

hey robert.

The only thing Kirkman should be bitching about is how they don't make sacks big enough to haul all his money to the fucking bank !

Piracy ??? Pshhh, He wouldn't even have a TV show had it not been for torrents and the spreading of word. I never would have bothered to pick up the series had I not been able to torrent the first 56 issues. 

I may still torrent, but I buy the issues to for my collection now. He never would have grown such a huge fanbase if it weren't for torrents. 

If that's you're attitude Mr. Kirkman, you money grubbing dick,...Well sir, then go fuck a corpse
